mapper.select: SELECT POSTKEY, POSTTITLE, POSTREADCOUNT, TO_CHAR(POSTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS POSTDATE FROM POST WHERE USERKEY = #{userKey} AND GROUPKEY = #{groupKey} ORDER BY POSTDATE DESC

SELECT USERKEY, POSTKEY, COMMENTCONTENT, GROUPKEY, REPLYCOUNT, POSTTITLE, TO_CHAR(COMMENTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') COMMENTDATE, POSTREADCOUNT FROM GCOMMENT LEFT JOIN (SELECT POSTKEY, POSTTITLE, REPLYCOUNT, POSTREADCOUNT FROM POST LEFT JOIN (SELECT POSTKEY, COUNT(POSTKEY) REPLYCOUNT FROM GCOMMENT GROUP BY POSTKEY) USING (POSTKEY)) USING(POSTKEY) WHERE USERKEY = #{userKey} AND GROUPKEY = #{groupKey}
